articles.title: The potential global health impact and cost-effectiveness of next-generation influenza vaccines: A modelling analysis
articles.description: Using influenza surveillance data, Lucy Goodfellow and colleagues model the potential global health impacts and cost effectiveness of next-generation influenza vaccines designed to increase efficacy and breadth.
articles.content:
